Package com.dev.sweproject

Class SweProjectApplication

java.lang.Object
com.dev.sweproject.SweProjectApplication
@SpringBootApplication @RestController public class SweProjectApplication extends Object
The main driver class for the application.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main entry point for the application.
      Parameters:
      args - The command-line arguments

    • registerClient

      @PostMapping(value="/register-client", produces="application/json") public String registerClient() throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Registers the client in the database to enable various operations. This needs to run once in the client's lifetime.
      Returns:
      A JSON response indicating the successful registration with a network Id.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there's an issue processing JSON data

    • uploadDoc

      @PostMapping("/upload-doc") public String uploadDoc(@RequestParam("network-id") String networkId, @RequestParam("document-name") String documentName, @RequestParam("user-id") String userId, @RequestBody org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile contents) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Uploads documents to the database. Documents are wrapped in a Document object before being stored.
      Parameters:
      networkId - The network to which the client belongs.
      documentName - The name of the document to upload.
      userId - The user Id of the uploader.
      contents - The file to upload.
      Returns:
      A JSON response indicating whether the file was successfully uploaded.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there's an issue processing JSON data

    • shareDocument

      @PatchMapping(value="/share-document", produces="application/json") public String shareDocument(@RequestParam("network-id") String networkId, @RequestParam("document-name") String documentName, @RequestParam("your-user-id") String yourUserId, @RequestParam("their-user-id") String theirUserId) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Shares a document with a specified user ('theirUserId').
      Parameters:
      networkId - A String representing the client's network ID.
      documentName - A String representing the name of the document to share.
      yourUserId - A String representing your user ID.
      theirUserId - A String representing the user ID of the person you want to share the document with.
      Returns:
      A String describing whether the document was successfully shared or not and the reason why.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there's an issue processing JSON data.

    • deleteDoc

      @DeleteMapping("/delete-doc") public String deleteDoc(@RequestParam("network-id") String networkId, @RequestParam("document-name") String documentName, @RequestParam("your-user-id") String yourUserId) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Delete Mapping that deletes documents from the database.
      Parameters:
      networkId - A String representing the network the client belongs to.
      documentName - A String representing the name of the document to delete.
      yourUserId - A String representing your user Id.
      Returns:
      A JSON response verifying whether the document was successfully deleted and providing a reason if it could not be deleted.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there's an issue processing JSON data.

    • checkForDoc

      @GetMapping(value="/check-for-doc", produces="application/json") public String checkForDoc(@RequestParam("network-id") String networkId, @RequestParam("document-name") String documentName, @RequestParam("your-user-id") String yourUserId) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Searches the client's network for a specified document. If the document exists, it is returned to the client. Otherwise a message is provided.
      Parameters:
      networkId - A String representing the client's network Id.
      documentName - A String representing the name of the document that the client is looking for.
      yourUserId - A String representing your user Id.
      Returns:
      A JSON object serialized as a String.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there's an issues processing JSON data.

    • seePreviousVersion

      @GetMapping(value="/see-previous-version", produces="application/json") public String seePreviousVersion(@RequestParam("network-id") String networkId, @RequestParam("document-name") String documentName, @RequestParam("your-user-id") String yourUserId, @RequestParam("revision-number") int revisionNumber) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Returns serialized JSON representation of a document's previous versions if it exists and as long as a user has permission to view it.
      Parameters:
      networkId - A String representing the client's network Id.
      documentName - A String representing the name of the document that the client is looking for.
      yourUserId - A String representing your user ID.
      revisionNumber - An int representing the version of the document to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A JSON object serialized as a String.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there's an issue processing JSON data.

    • seeDocumentStats

      @GetMapping(value="/see-document-stats", produces="application/json") public String seeDocumentStats(@RequestParam("network-id") String networkId, @RequestParam("document-name") String documentName, @RequestParam("your-user-id") String yourUserId) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Generates document statistics in the form of a String.
      Parameters:
      networkId - A String representing the client's network ID.
      documentName - A String representing the name of the document.
      yourUserId - A String representing your user ID.
      Returns:
      A String with the client ID, word count, users, and the number of previous versions saved.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there's an issue processing JSON data.

    • generateDifferenceSummary

      @GetMapping(value="/generate-difference-summary", produces="application/json") public String generateDifferenceSummary(@RequestParam("network-id") String networkId, @RequestParam("fst-doc-name") String fstDocName, @RequestParam("snd-doc-name") String sndDocName, @RequestParam("your-user-id") String yourUserId) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Generates a report on the difference between two documents.
      Parameters:
      networkId - A String representing the client's network ID.
      fstDocName - A String representing the name of the first document.
      sndDocName - A String representing the name of the second document.
      yourUserId - A String representing your user ID.
      Returns:
      String representation of the comparison made between two documents.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there's an issue processing JSON data.

    • downloadDoc

      @GetMapping(value="/download-doc", produces="application/octet-stream") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> downloadDoc(@RequestParam("network-id") String networkId, @RequestParam("document-name") String documentName, @RequestParam("your-user-id") String yourUserId, @RequestBody(required=false) String jsonObject)
      Downloads documents from the database.
      Parameters:
      networkId - A String representing the network to which the client belongs.
      documentName - A String representing the name of the document to download.
      yourUserId - A String representing your user ID.
      jsonObject - An optional JSON Object String.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity with the appropriate status code and document as the response body if available.
